connect_wallet_description: To use Orakl Network services, you need to connect to your wallet first.

account.title: Create account to take advantage of Orakl's services
account.description: To utilize the VRF and Request-Response services, one must create an account and ensure that sufficient funds are added to cover the associated costs.

recent_accounts.title: Recent accounts
recent_accounts.description: The most recent accounts created by users

create_account_sheet.title: Create account
create_account_sheet.description: Create an account ID using your wallet address. The account ID will be used in your contract when utilizing the VRF or Request-Response service.
create_account_sheet.as_an_owner: *As an owner, you can cancel or edit the account at any time.
create_account_sheet.consumer_description: Add a consumer address to your account to allow them to access and use your account services. This consumer will be able to interact with your account based on the permissions granted.
create_account_sheet.deposit_description: Add ETH to your account to fund your operations and transactions. This deposit will be used to cover gas fees and other costs associated with using the account services.

data_feed.page_description: Orakl Network offers an enhanced range of price feeds to support the broad DeFi ecosystem and nurture new and upcoming tokens.
data_feed.page_description_2: Data Feed leverages offchain aggregation, providing better stability and scalability. Price feeds can be accessed through Proxy or Router contracts.
data_feed.search_placeholder: Search by symbol, address, price, market cap...
